forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 8 to 13 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
As dusk settles over Downtown San Francisco, the city reveals a mostly cloudy cloak, a soft, muted backdrop against which the lights begin to twinkle. The low temperature of about fifty-four degrees wraps the evening in a cool embrace, while gentle winds breeze through at eight to thirteen miles per hour, adding an additional chill that might coax a cozy sweater or light jacket from your wardrobe. 

Looking ahead to the morrow, a promising shift emerges. A mostly sunny Sunday paints an inviting picture, with a high near sixty-five, gradually yielding to the comfortable sixties as afternoon unfolds. The winds will carry on, whispering at seven to sixteen mph and occasionally picking up to tug playfully at your clothes. The outlook teases the senses with possibilities—perhaps a stroll along the Embarcadero, where the sparkle of sunlight dances on the water, or a quiet moment at a local café, enjoying a warm drink as you watch life move by. Dress in layers; it’s a day that beckons for warmth yet offers the tender kiss of the sun's rays—perfect for mundane adventures around the city that embrace both the chill of the evening and the warmth of the day to come.
